page.title: 17The Youth Club
page.content: The Youth Club is a place for enjoyment,fun and laughter.There is a section for the eleven to fourteen years and there is a section for an older group.It costs fifteen pence if you are a member,or other wise it costs thirty pence.Some of the members have dance competitions and others play pool.The lady who takes the Youth Club comes from Wetherby, thirteen miles away.There are lots of sporting games you can play such as Badminton, Hockey and Table Tennis. It is on two nights a week from seven o.clock till nine thirty.On one occasion we went camping to Carlton Lodge.About forty children attend the Youth Club each week.
